table.name: ob_line
table.description: This table consists of the individual line items for the order base. For e.g., if the order base has an order of: 500 Nike Shoes, from Philly to N.Y. latest by Jan/1/2001 the line items may contain: 200 Nike Shoes, from Philly to N.Y. 200 Socks, from Nashville to N.Y. Etc. Generally the line item should have the same destination for an order base, however that is not a rule. The tags are used in the line item for tracking purposes. These can be any combination of defined serial numbers. Four tags can be specified for tracking at various levels.

columns.name: OB_LINE_GID
columns.description: The GID for the order base line associated with the order base.

columns.name: OB_LINE_XID
columns.description: The XID for the order base line.

columns.name: ORDER_BASE_GID
columns.description: The order base GID associated to this order base line.

columns.name: SOURCE_LOCATION_GID
columns.description: The source location GID for the pickup location associated with this order base line.

columns.name: DEST_LOCATION_GID
columns.description: The destination location GID for the delivery location associated with this order base line.

columns.name: TAG1
columns.description: Additional information about the item. Like the color or size code etc.

columns.name: TAG2
columns.description: Additional information about the item. Like the color or size code etc.

columns.name: TAG3
columns.description: Additional information about the item. Like the color or size code etc.

columns.name: TAG4
columns.description: Additional information about the item. Like the color or size code etc.

columns.name: IS_SPLIT_ALLOWED
columns.description: A true or false flag to define whether the line item can be split during the order release or shipment.

columns.name: WEIGHT
columns.description: The weight of the packaged items for this line.

columns.name: WEIGHT_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The weight unit of measure.

columns.name: WEIGHT_BASE
columns.description: The weight in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: VOLUME
columns.description: The volume of the packaged items for this line.

columns.name: VOLUME_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The volume unit of measure.

columns.name: VOLUME_BASE
columns.description: The volume in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: DECLARED_VALUE
columns.description: The declared value contains the stated value for the order base line item.

columns.name: DECLARED_VALUE_BASE
columns.description: The declared value in the base currency.

columns.name: DECLARED_VALUE_CURRENCY_GID
columns.description: The declared value currency identifier.

columns.name: EARLY_PICKUP_DATE
columns.description: The earliest date when the item can be picked up.

columns.name: LATE_PICKUP_DATE
columns.description: The latest date when the item can be picked up.

columns.name: EARLY_DELIVERY_DATE
columns.description: The earliest date when the item can be delivered.

columns.name: LATE_DELIVERY_DATE
columns.description: The latest date when the item can be picked delivered.

columns.name: PACKAGED_ITEM_GID
columns.description: The packaged item GID defining the item associated to this order base line.

columns.name: IS_AUTO_RELEASE
columns.description: A Y/N indicator to create the order release line from the order base line when it is initially created.

columns.name: PACKAGED_COUNT
columns.description: The package count associated with the packaged item for this line. For example, 10 cases of product A.

columns.name: LOAD_POINT
columns.description: The specific loading location for the source location on the line.

columns.name: UNLOAD_POINT
columns.description: The specific unloading location for the delivery location on the line.

columns.name: PICKUP_IS_APPT
columns.description: Indicates if the early/late pickup times are appointment times.

columns.name: DELIVERY_IS_APPT
columns.description: Indicates if the early/late delivery times are appointment times.

columns.name: PLAN_FROM_LOCATION_GID
columns.description: The plan from location GID can define a location other than the source location of the line to beginning planning transport.

columns.name: PLAN_FROM_LOAD_POINT
columns.description: The specific loading location for the plan from location on the line.

columns.name: PLAN_TO_LOCATION_GID
columns.description: The plan to location GID can define a location other than the destination location of the line to terminate planning transport.

columns.name: PLAN_TO_UNLOAD_POINT
columns.description: The specific unloading location for the plan to location on the line.

columns.name: NUM_LAYERS_PER_SHIP_UNIT
columns.description: The number of layers for the transportation handling unit defined on the order base line. This allows you to define the TiHi date used to build ship units on the order release per each transactional line passed in, instead of looking to the static TiHi data on the packaged item table.

columns.name: IS_SHIPPABLE
columns.description: A Y/N indicator defining if the order base line is ready to be shipped by creating an order release for it.

columns.name: QUANTITY_PER_LAYER
columns.description: The quantity per layer for the transportation handling unit defined on the order base line. This allows you to define the TiHi date used to build ship units on the order release per each transactional line passed in, instead of looking to the static TiHi data on the packaged item table

columns.name: RELEASED_WEIGHT
columns.description: The total released weight that has already been released against this order base line.

columns.name: RELEASED_WEIGHT_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The released weight unit of measure.

columns.name: RELEASED_WEIGHT_BASE
columns.description: The released weight in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: RELEASED_VOLUME
columns.description: The total volume that has already been released against this order base line.

columns.name: RELEASED_VOLUME_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The released volume unit of measure.

columns.name: RELEASED_VOLUME_BASE
columns.description: The released volume in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: RELEASED_COUNT
columns.description: The total released package count that has already been released against this order base line.

columns.name: PACKAGING_UNIT_GID
columns.description: The packaging unit (considered an inner pack to the packaged item level) for this order base line.

columns.name: PACKAGING_UNIT_COUNT
columns.description: The packaging unit count associated to the packaging unit for this order base line.

columns.name: TRANSPORT_HANDLING_UNIT_GID
columns.description: The transport handling unit that is to be used when building the order release ship unit. If defined here, it will take precedence to the data that is defined on the static packaged item table.

columns.name: INITIAL_ITEM_GID
columns.description: Can be used to define the substitution.

columns.name: ROUNDING_INSTRUCTION
columns.description: How the releasing logic will look to handle rounding when calculating the released values.

columns.name: ROUND_TO
columns.description: Round to packaging unit quantity (PUQ), layer (LAY), or transport handling unit (THU).

columns.name: BUFFER_LOCATION_GID
columns.description: The buffer location GID. A buffer location can be an stock holding location that the order release ship to location will be built to. A subsequent order release will be created to move from this buffer location to the planned ship to location.

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.

columns.name: THU_PROFILE_GID
columns.description: The transport handling unit profile (list of valid THUs for this order line) that is to be used when building the order release ship unit. If defined here it will take precedence to the data that is defined on the static packaged Item table.

columns.description: Attribute fields (flexfields) allow you to add additional information about an object. Data Type VARCHAR2 (150)

columns.name: READY_QUANTITY
